snippet.title: Steam "Castle of Shikigami 3" Promotional Video
snippet.description:
Castle of Shikigami III is the PC port of the third game in the Castle of Shikigami series, which first appeared in arcades in 2006.

Steam Store URL: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3253690/Castle_of_Shikigami_3

- A culmination of character shooting games set in a unique worldview!

- A wide variety of newly added playable characters and attack methods, as well as a 2P scenario that is different from 1P play.

- Equipped with a high-tension MAX system that will satisfy your insatiable passion for shooting games!
